zh.title: 求购集成电路产业链头部公司股份；转让头部果汁饮料公司LP份额｜资情留言板第165期
zh.summary: 36氪资情留言板第164期发布20条资产交易信息，包括字节跳动、小红书等公司老股转让及求购需求，涉及估值超3000亿美元，同时提供医疗器械、小家电等领域并购标的对接服务。

zh.title: 求购宇树科技老股份额；求购小红书老股份额｜资情留言板第166期
zh.summary: 36氪资情留言板第166期发布23条资产交易信息，包括字节跳动、小红书、宇树科技等公司老股求购与转让，涉及估值最高达3270亿美元，同时提供医疗器械、小家电等领域的并购标的需求。

zh.title: 「Manus+景鲲」领衔主演，华人AI Agent全球狂欢
zh.summary: 前百度副总裁景鲲创立的AI公司MainFunc旗下产品Genspark在45天内实现3600万美元年度收入，华人AI Agent在全球引发关注，其中Monica团队开发的Manus更获硅谷7500万美元融资，但近期用户数据下滑，行业面临增长挑战。

zh.title: 氪星晚报 ｜雀巢考虑出售表现欠佳的维生素品牌；特斯拉计划2026年在美国启动建设第三座储能超级工厂；
zh.summary: 百度启动高管轮岗，谢天调任智能驾驶事业群负责地图业务；蚂蚁集团推出企业版智能体平台"百宝箱"，计划年内覆盖千家客户；特斯拉宣布2026年将在美国建设第三座储能超级工厂；AMD CEO指出台积电美国工厂芯片成本较台湾高5%-20%。

zh.title: 关于良品铺子「卖身」国资的五个问题｜氪金·大事件
zh.summary: 良品铺子控股股东拟向武汉国资委转让29.99%股份，交易总价近15亿元，但广州轻工因股权纠纷提起诉讼并冻结相关股份，导致交易存在不确定性。

zh.title: 2026 款吉利银河 E5 上市：最大续航里程提升至 610km，售 10.98 万元起
zh.summary: 2026款吉利银河E5上市，新增610km长续航版，售价10.98万起，搭载升级版Flyme Auto系统，底盘减震性能提升20%。

zh.title: 微软将为 Visual Studio 带来重大升级，集成大量 AI 功能
zh.summary: 微软将推出Visual Studio 18重大更新，集成AI功能应对市场竞争，目前内部测试已启动。

zh.title: 专为-40°C 极端低温环境所造，中铁智能装备“川山甲 1 号”盾构机下线
zh.summary: 我国自主研发的"川山甲1号"盾构机今日下线，专为零下40度极寒环境设计，将用于欧洲高纬度河道工程，具备防结泥饼等创新技术。

zh.title: 消息称零跑与一汽计划基于 B 平台开发出口车型，国内与一汽大众合作
zh.summary: 一汽与零跑深化合作：将基于零跑B平台开发海外车型，并为一汽大众提供技术架构开发国内新车型，红旗品牌也将采用零跑电动车平台推出SUV车型。

zh.title: 美团召开外卖行业恳谈会：商家担忧被迫参加价格战、客单价下滑等
zh.summary: 美团外卖行业恳谈会揭露价格战乱象：连锁品牌客单价从25元跌至10多元，商户收入减少15%，多地餐饮协会呼吁停止恶性竞争，市场监管总局已约谈相关平台。

zh.title: vivo自研蓝河操作系统内核开源！Rust开发新机遇来了
zh.summary: vivo开源自研蓝河操作系统内核，采用Rust语言开发，主打安全轻量特性，为开发者提供新机遇。

zh.title: 蚂蚁百宝箱智能体企业版上线，配套支付、营销MCP，最快1天上线
zh.summary: 蚂蚁集团推出"百宝箱"智能体企业版，配套支付营销工具，最快可实现1天快速部署，计划面向千家企业开放合作。

zh.title: 官方揭秘ChatGPT Agent背后原理！通过强化学习让模型自主探索最佳工具组合
zh.summary: OpenAI公布ChatGPT Agent技术细节：采用强化学习优化工具组合，Plus会员每月可享40次使用机会。

zh.title: 突然发疯！人形格斗冠军机器人凌空回旋踢，架子都干翻，现场研究员：0.0？
zh.summary: 人形格斗机器人突发异常动作，在测试中自主完成高难度回旋踢击倒训练架，研究人员震惊于其未经编程的突发行为。

zh.title: 硅谷AI初创重新拥抱996
zh.summary: 硅谷AI初创公司推行高强度工作制，要求员工接受每周72小时工作安排，引发行业热议。

zh.title: 倒计时3天！锁定直播，共赴2025 WAIC云帆奖颁奖典礼&挚友之夜！
zh.summary: 2025世界人工智能大会云帆奖颁奖典礼暨挚友之夜即将开幕，3天后开启线上直播。

zh.title: MeanFlow再下一城，北大提出机器人学习新范式MP1，实现速度与成功率双SOTA
zh.summary: 北大团队提出MeanFlow-Policy 1机器人学习新范式，在速度和任务成功率上均达SOTA水平。

zh.title: 九章云极DataCanvas智算普惠中国行上海首发 推出企业级智能体
zh.summary: 九章云极DataCanvas在上海启动智算普惠中国行，发布企业级智能体解决方案。

zh.title: 华为MatePad Pro 12.2平板正式发布，全面释放生产、创作潜力
zh.summary: 华为发布12.2英寸MatePad Pro平板，主打高效生产力与创意设计功能。

zh.title: 创智突破：AI首次自主发现106个超越人类设计的神经网络架构
zh.summary: AI自主创新突破：首次独立设计出106种超越人类水平的神经网络架构。

en.title: Itch.io follows Steam in removing adult games
en.summary: Itch.io removes adult games from search results due to payment processor concerns, with some content facing permanent removal from the indie gaming platform.

en.title: Here is Lego’s official Nintendo Game Boy — with lenticular display
en.summary: Lego unveils a $60 replica of Nintendo's 1989 Game Boy, available for preorder with an October 1st release date.

en.title: Trump wanted to break up Nvidia — but then its CEO won him over
en.summary: 特朗普承认曾考虑拆分英伟达，称在了解AI芯片巨头前支持分拆该公司。

en.title: Undeterred by limits, Elon Musk plots a big robotaxi expansion
en.summary: Tesla plans to expand its robotaxi service to Florida, Nevada, Arizona, and California while testing Full Self-Driving tech in Europe and China for potential near-future rollout.

en.title: Google leaks its full Pixel 10 lineup
en.summary: Google accidentally leaked its entire Pixel 10 lineup, including Pro, Pro XL, and Pro Fold models, through a banner on the Play Store just weeks before the official launch.

en.title: OpenAI and partners are building a massive AI data center in Texas
en.summary: OpenAI联合合作伙伴在德州建设超大规模AI数据中心，项目负责人称其为"真正庞大的基础设施工程"，预计将显著提升AI算力供给。

en.title: Yet another bad three months as Tesla reports its Q2 2025 results
en.summary: 特斯拉2025年Q2财报显示连续三季度业绩下滑，虽保持盈利但面临严峻市场挑战。

en.title: Julian LeFay, “the father of The Elder Scrolls,” has died at 59
en.summary: 《上古卷轴》之父Julian LeFay去世，享年59岁，他主导开发了系列前两作《竞技场》和《匕首雨》，后由Todd Howard接棒。

en.title: What to know about ToolShell, the SharePoint threat under mass exploitation
en.summary: 黑客正大规模利用SharePoint漏洞ToolShell发起攻击，该漏洞允许未经身份验证的访问且易于利用，影响范围广泛。

en.title: After $380M hack, Clorox sues its “service desk” vendor for simply giving out passwords
en.summary: Clorox files lawsuit against IT vendor for allegedly facilitating $380M hack by sharing passwords, calling the 2023 breach "easily preventable."

en.title: What role should oil and gas companies play in climate tech?
en.summary: Quaise Energy aims to revolutionize geothermal power with gyrotron drilling tech, enabling deeper, cheaper access to Earth's heat globally.

en.title: Google DeepMind’s new AI can help historians understand ancient Latin inscriptions
en.summary: Google DeepMind's new AI tool Aeneas can decipher ancient Latin inscriptions, analyzing weathered stone engravings to determine their origin and historical context, building on its predecessor Ithaca's text reconstruction capabilities.

en.title: The Download: what’s next for AI agents, and how Trump protects US tech companies overseas
en.summary: The Download newsletter explores the growing trend of AI agents, advanced models that go beyond information retrieval to actively perform tasks on users' behalf.

en.title: Fighting forever chemicals and startup fatigue
en.summary: Michigan startup Enspired Solutions, founded by a toxicologist and chemical engineer, develops technology to permanently eliminate toxic PFAS "forever chemicals" from water, tackling a major environmental challenge.

en.title: The Download: how to melt rocks, and what you need to know about AI
en.summary: Geothermal startup Quaise is pioneering a novel drilling method using energy beams to access deep geothermal resources, potentially revolutionizing clean energy extraction.

en.title: A new AI coding challenge just published its first results — and they aren’t pretty
en.summary: AI coding challenge crowns first winner, raising the bar for AI-powered software engineering capabilities.

en.title: Trump’s ‘anti-woke AI’ order could reshape how US tech companies train their models
en.summary: 中国AI模型因回避敏感政治问题引发西方关注，美方称其反映官方立场，OpenAI等企业以此为由强调自身技术中立性。

en.title: Sundar Pichai is ‘very excited’ about Google Cloud’s OpenAI partnership
en.summary: Google CEO Sundar Pichai faced analyst questions about AI's impact on search and the company's $10 billion AI investment push during earnings call.

en.title: A troubled SPAC plans to buy iRocket for $400M but it already returned most of its cash
en.summary: A struggling SPAC with depleted funds proposes $400M acquisition of rocket startup iRocket, raising concerns about the deal's viability as the blank-check firm has returned most investor capital.

en.title: YouTube sees a rise in ad revenue to reach nearly $10B
en.summary: YouTube广告收入增长13%至98亿美元，持续领跑流媒体市场。
